item.title: FlareFlow Shoots to U.S. Top 5 Entertainment Apps With Micro-Drama Binge Formula
item.description: COL Group’s micro-drama platform FlareFlow has cracked the code on addictive short-form content, surging into the Top 5 Entertainment Apps on Google Play in the U.S. and climbing to Top 8 on App
